name: Rebirth of the Phoenix
description: In Rebirth of the Phoenix, you play as a phoenix shooting fire at enemies. On killed you are sent to the shop where you can choose to either spend points on permanent upgrades or heal during a run. This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. Please let me know if you find any bugs so I can fix them after the voting time. The music was provided by Pixabay.com and some of the sound effects were provided from Mixkit.co.
